data.author: Foolish Designs

changelog.release_notes:
Update to optimize code and battery use.
Added second pulse to autobot logo.  Should be low power.

Initial version for release!

All features working.  Will work on further customization later.

data.description:
Bold display using the autobot symbol to show both battery and bluetooth connection.  Shows time, day of month, and day of week.

This watchface expects you to have a bluetooth device connected to the watch.  When the watch loses connection, it buzzes up to three times (one per minute) warning you that you have left bluetooth range of the connected device.  This is to prevent you from losing your phone.

If you do not have a bluetooth device, just ignore the buzzing until the 3rd warning, and it will go away.

Currently in testing to make sure that battery use is minimized.  Updates possible.

latest_release.release_notes:
Update to optimize code and battery use.
Added second pulse to autobot logo.  Should be low power.

data.title: Autobot Bold
